Docs.summary: Identifies the font properties of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The FontProperty enumeration represents a set of font properties that describe visual style elements. The FontProperty values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.
